name: Charlie Sudden
title: Scientist
description: Ze isn't very humble but no one can research as fast as Charlie!

name: Jamie Law
title: Builder
description: Jamie likes to dance and are a well-educated builder.

name: Sam Bell
title: Lost Soul
description: As the blood on hirs shirt had begin to harden no one knew it's origin. Was it Cannibalism? Nosebleed or clone sickness?

name: Drew Chilli
title: Botanist
description: Drew loves meetings and beer. Drew will almost certainly know most about chilli plants on your entire moonbase if hired.

name: Riley Crunch
title: Expert Botanist
description: Riley enjoys the company of flowers more than the company of humanoids! A true botanist indeed!

name: Logan Anderson
title: Medic
description: Sick or sound? Doesn't matter! Logan cures everything coming hir way.

name: Releaxed Mason
title: Joker
description: Relaxed Mason isn't very good at anything but ze will definitely bring humor to your base.

name: Pope Joan
title: Spiritualist
description: Will Joan bring moral and ethics to your base? Or will he bring debts?
